description:

If America is not the “greatest country in the world” why is everyone and their grandmas trying to come here? And why should we take on the world's burden if this is such an awful place? And if America is not the best, which one is?

These are questions one may not ask during DEI training, as even mentioning America and its greatest will get you fired as the dean of students for a Colorado school district.

Patrick Hogarty did not get that memo but realized after the fact that his First Amendment rights were violated.
title: Dean of students fired for calling America "the greatest country," it went against his DEI training

A couple of years ago, Kamala had everything to do with the border but now that she is running for president she wants everyone to think she didn’t oversee the worst border crisis in American history. title: "A slap in the face:" Border Union WRECKS Kamala Harris's cheap PR stunt on the border

If you have been following the presidential race, you know that the left and the media (but I repeat myself) think Donald Trump being reelected would literally destroy America literally. Democracy? Gone! The Constitution? Shredded! Cats and dogs living together, people being forced to use the bathroom according to the gender they were born with (aka their gender), it would be chaos!

title: Watch: Lefties drop demonic new cartoon of what they think Trump winning looks like, and... just, wow
